mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (isbn, title, author, category, format, release) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{category}, #{format}, #{release})
mapper.select: SELECT isbn, title, author, category, format, release FROM book
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET title = #{book.title}, author = #{book.author}, category = #{book.category}, format = #{book.format}, release = #{book.release} WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
